title: With AI slop on the rise, Elon Musk says Grok will soon detect deepfakes and track down their origin
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is improving every day. Users are now easily able to generate realistic videos with AI, raising concerns over deepfakes in the future. Tech billionaire Elon Musk has now claimed that Grok will soon be able to detect AI clips and find its source.
content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is transforming the internet. Tools like Grok Imagine and Sora have made it easy for anyone to create realistic AI-generated videos. This has raised alarms for many who believe that this could allow anyone to create deepf... [1912 chars]

title: AI buzz powers SK Hynix and Samsung stock to record highs
description: South Korean chipmakers SK Hynix (HXSCF) and Samsung Electronics (SSNLF) notched record highs on Friday, after a near-weeklong holiday, driven by a series of artificial intelligence deals.

title: Soon, Delhi residents can apply for birth, caste certificates on WhatsApp
description: NEW DELHI, Oct 10:  The Delhi Government is working to provide several of its services in a faceless manner, with documents like birth and caste certificates being applied for and delivered using WhatsApp, officials said on Thursday. Nearly 50 services of different departments have been identified, for which one can apply through WhatsApp, they said. Under the ‘Governance through WhatsApp’ initiative, various services that can be currently applied for online, will be brought to WhatsApp using artificial intelligence, said a […]
content:

title: The Edge named as co-founder of soil regeneration firm
description: U2 guitarist David Howell Evans, known as The Edge, has been announced as the co-founder of a new soil regeneration company called Oath, which uses artificial intelligence to find innovative methods to address the growing global problem of soil degradation.

title: AI Crypto Millionaire Sparks Legal Battle for Personhood

title: AI Jobs Shock Is Coming and Firms Aren’t Ready, Klarna CEO Says
description: From technology firms to translators, the world has not faced up to the consequences of artificial intelligence wiping out swathes of jobs, according to one of AI’s biggest cheerleaders in finance.
content:

title: OpenAI tells EU it is struggling to compete with Google as ChatGPT and Sora usage hits all time high
description: OpenAI has raised concerns with the European Commission regarding competition in the artificial intelligence sector, particularly in relation to Alphabet's Google. The company highlighted the challenges of competing with established players and called for regulatory scrutiny to ensure fair market practices.
content: OpenAI, the company behind ChatGPT, has approached the European Commission to highlight concerns about competition in the rapidly evolving artificial intelligence sector. With more than 800 million weekly users and a recent secondary share sale pushi... [4502 chars]

title: China steps up customs crackdown on Nvidia AI chips: Report
description: China has ramped up enforcement of its chip import restrictions, aiming to reduce domestic technology companies' dependence on US products such as Nvidia's artificial intelligence processors, the Financial Times reported on Friday (Oct 10).Reuters could not immediately verify the report.Teams of custom
